titleStmt.title: The Prince of Orange's third declaration
titleStmt.author: William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

notesStmt.note: "Given under our Hand and Seal at our Head-quarters at Sherburn Castle, the 28th day of November, 1688. William Henry Prince of Orange. By His Highness special Command, C. Huygens"
Reproduction of original in: Huntington Library.
